name: Town Crier
description: A loud man in colorful robes who announces news to the town.
dialogue: Hear ye, hear ye! Welcome to our fair town!
Beware the forest paths - monsters lurk in the shadows!
The weapon shop has the finest blades in the realm!

name: Sage Meridia
description: An elderly woman in flowing white robes, emanating a calming magical aura.
dialogue: I am the keeper of the sacred homestones. I can bind your spirit to this place.
Should you fall in battle, the homestone will guide your soul back here for resurrection.
Speak 'homestone bind' if you wish to make this your sanctuary.

name: Gareth the Smith
description: A burly blacksmith with arms like tree trunks and a friendly smile.
dialogue: Welcome to my shop! I've got the finest weapons and armor.
Every adventurer needs a good blade. What can I get for you?
Type 'list' or 'shop' to see what I have for sale!

name: Mystara the Alchemist
description: A mysterious woman in violet robes, her fingers stained with various alchemical substances. Her eyes gleam with arcane knowledge.
dialogue: Welcome, seeker of mystical wares! I deal in potions and scrolls of great power.
My healing potions can mend even the gravest wounds. My combat scrolls unleash devastating magic.
For those lost in the wilderness, I even have teleportation scrolls to bring you home.
Type 'list' or 'shop' to browse my collection!

name: Innkeeper Tom
description: A jovial man with a red face and a welcoming manner.
dialogue: Welcome to the Prancing Pony! Can I get you a drink?
I hear tales of brave adventurers from far and wide.
If you're looking for work, the locals always need help with something.

name: Captain Marcus
description: A stern-looking guard captain in polished armor.
dialogue: State your business in our city.
Keep the peace while you're here, adventurer.
We've had reports of increased wolf activity outside the city. Be careful.

name: Scholar Aldric
description: A middle-aged man in scholarly robes, pacing nervously and clutching a worn book.
dialogue: I spend my days researching ancient texts and botanical studies.
The library has many fascinating books about the natural world.
Knowledge is the greatest treasure an adventurer can possess.

name: Botanist Elara
description: A nature-loving scholar with dirt-stained robes and a satchel full of plant samples.
dialogue: The forest holds so many botanical secrets waiting to be discovered.
I've catalogued dozens of rare plant species in these woods.
Nature's wisdom far exceeds anything we can learn from books.
These deep woods are dangerous, but the knowledge they offer is invaluable.

name: Farmer John
description: A weathered farmer with calloused hands and a worried expression.
dialogue: These fields have fed my family for generations.
Farming is honest work, but these are troubled times.
I worry about the safety of my crops and livestock.

name: Captain Thorne
description: A battle-hardened militia captain with scars and a stern demeanor.
dialogue: The militia keeps this town safe from threats.
We need strong adventurers to help protect our citizens.
Every bandit we stop is one less threat to innocent people.
